abstract: Citigroup may shorten its name to Citi and get rid of the red umbrella logo it inherited from Travelers Group.
snippet: Citigroup may shorten its name to Citi and get rid of the red umbrella logo it inherited from Travelers Group.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, the global banking giant, is shrinking — but only its name. Executives are prepared to rebrand the company "Citi" and to fold up its familiar red umbrella and instead use a logo with a stylized arc above the name.

headline.main: Just ‘Citi’ as the Brand, and a Folded Umbrella
headline.print_headline: Just ‘Citi’ As the Brand, And a Folded Umbrella
